title: How to Create Invisible Matter in LittleBigPlanet 2

steps.headline: Using the right stick, make the dark matter, rubber, or cardboard as tiny as possible.
steps.description: You will notice that at their smallest states, those materials are completely invisible.

steps.headline: After making the materials invisible, place them where you'd like in your level with the left stick according to your level plans.
Place invisible dark matter where you want floating invisible matter with the left stick and the X button.
steps.description: Invisible dark matter won't move when pushed or shoved, so it is also good if you don't want your invisible matter to move around.

steps.headline: Test out the placing of your invisible dark matter by deactivation your levitation with the down button.
steps.description: If you want to try out your entire level, select "Switch to Play Mode" from the start menu.

steps.headline: Place the invisible rubber/cardboard matter close to where you want it to be.
steps.description: Keep in mind that it can't float and will fall to the ground when your pop-it menu is closed and/or when you resume the level.

steps.headline: Position the other objects you'll need before closing the popit menu and/or resuming the level.
steps.description: The invisible matter will fall to the ground as soon as you close the popit menu and/or resume the level.

text: Creating the Invisible Matter Using the right stick, make the dark matter, rubber, or cardboard as tiny as possible. You will notice that at their smallest states, those materials are completely invisible. After making the materials invisible, place them where you'd like in your level with the left stick according to your level plans.  Using Invisible Dark Mater Place invisible dark matter where you want floating invisible matter with the left stick and the X button. Invisible dark matter won't move when pushed or shoved, so it is also good if you don't want your invisible matter to move around. Test out the placing of your invisible dark matter by deactivation your levitation with the down button. If you want to try out your entire level, select "Switch to Play Mode" from the start menu. Using Invisible Rubber\/Cardboard Matter Place the invisible rubber/cardboard matter close to where you want it to be. Keep in mind that it can't float and will fall to the ground when your pop-it menu is closed and/or when you resume the level. Position the other objects you'll need before closing the popit menu and/or resuming the level. The invisible matter will fall to the ground as soon as you close the popit menu and/or resume the level.
